title: Hyena Rampage
tagline: in which the Fellowship saves Karawa
summary: Dunmar Fellowship saves Karawa villagers from giant hyenas, with villagers aiding in the battle.
Village leaders task Delwath and companions with investigating the mysterious attacks.
The Fellowship tracks the beasts' trail into the desert, loses it in rocky canyons, but spots a distant commotion.
They meet Alesh, a Dunmari scout, who shares concerns about the growing dangers in the plains.
Exhausted from travel, they reach Gomat Oasis at night, finding lizards feasting on sheep carcasses.
short_summary: The Dunmar Fellowship saves villagers from hyenas, investigates the attacks, and arrives at Gomat Oasis to find more danger.
